sos.subtitle: View and manage your account details
sos.immediateEmergency: E fit be life and death matter?
sos.clickToInstruction: Touch de button below to send SOS sharp sharp with your location.
sos.emergencyTypeSelect: Choose de kind emergency so responders go fit prepare better help for you
sos.additionalInfoDesc: Put extra gist to help responders sabi wetin dey sup
sos.additionalInfoPlaceholder: E.g., How many people dey, medical needs, land mark for your side...
sos.locationDesc: Responders gbakwu you once we get your location
sos.locationAccessRequiredTitle: We need access to your Location
sos.locationAccessRequiredDesc: Abeg allow location access so we fit sabi where you dey. Check your browser or phone settings.
sos.gettingYourLocation: We dey find where you dey...
sos.troubleshootDesc: If you dey see 'Location Error' or location no dey show:
sos.troubleshootStep1_1: Go to System Settings → Privacy & Security → Location Services.
sos.troubleshootStep1_3: Ensure Google Chrome is toggled ON.
sos.troubleshootStep2Desc: Toggling Wi-Fi off and on can sometimes force a location refresh.
sos.troubleshootStep3Desc: If GPS persists in failing, please use the 'Enter Location Manually' option to ensure responders can find you.
sos.specificAddressPlaceholder: Abeg explain where you dey well well so responders fit find you.
sos.worksOnNetworks: E dey work for MTN, Airtel, Glo, 9mobile
sos.ussdCodesNotAvailable: USSD code no dey for your area.
sos.nextStep1: Your SOS go reach CARITAS and responders sharp sharp.
sos.nextStep2: Our team go call you sharp sharp.
sos.nextStep3: Responders go come reach your GPS location.
sos.nextStep4: Keep your phone open and stay for safe place.
sos.locationErrorDesc: We no fit find where you dey.
sos.locationTimeout: Time don pass for location request.
sos.ussdLoadError: Error as we dey load USSD codes.
sos.locationRequiredDesc: Abeg allow location or put am yourself to send SOS.
sos.detailsRequiredDesc: Abeg put State and Address for manual location.
sos.sosSentDesc: Responders don sabi wetin dey sup.
sos.sosFailedDesc: We no fit send SOS. Abeg use USSD codes.
